entry.title: Give me the weirdo teams (Super Auto Pets)

media:group.media:title: Give me the weirdo teams (Super Auto Pets)
media:group.media:description:
Super Auto Pets on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1714040/Super_Auto_Pets/
This is fresh for YouTube content, not a stinky stream VOD, I promise!
Super Auto Pets is a cute free autobattler (like Teamfight Tactics) that is really cute and has some strategic depth. Give it a try, you may be surprised by how much it mooves you!

media:group.media:title: Maybe I'm horrendous at geography? (Sporcle)
media:group.media:description:
This was taken from my stream on November 1st, 2022! Catch me live Monday to Friday here: http://twitch.tv/Northernlion
When I don't know what to play, I play Sporcle. It's perfect!

entry.title: Can I guess what Wikipedia article is more popular? (WikiArena)

media:group.media:title: Can I guess what Wikipedia article is more popular? (WikiArena)
media:group.media:description:
Check out WikiArena on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2090700/WikiArena/
This came from my Twitch stream on November 2nd, 2022. Check me out live every weekday from 9AM-2PM: http://twitch.tv/Northernlion
WikiArena is a cool game where you get a random pair of Wikipedia articles and have to choose either which one is longer or which one has more views. It's trickier than you'd think, and you might even learn something in the process. Check it out!
If you enjoyed the video, please consider hitting the Like button. It helps me out a lot! ----------------------------------------------- Subscribe: http://bit.ly/Northernlion Follow me on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Northernlion -----------------------------------------------

entry.title: Don't tempt me, I will shred him (Dome Keeper)

media:group.media:title: Don't tempt me, I will shred him (Dome Keeper)
media:group.media:description:
Dome Keeper on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1637320/Dome_Keeper/
This video came from my stream on November 1st, 2022. Catch me live every weekday from 9AM-2PM PT here: http://twitch.tv/Northernlion
Dome Keeper is a cool strategy game that doesn't require 4000 APM to hit Silver IV. Check it out!
If you enjoyed the video, please consider hitting the Like button. It helps me out a lot! ----------------------------------------------- Subscribe: http://bit.ly/Northernlion Follow me on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Northernlion -----------------------------------------------

entry.title: I knew we had it in us (Fall Guys)

media:group.media:title: I knew we had it in us (Fall Guys)
media:group.media:description:
Fall Guys on Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/fall-guys Apollo's channel: http://twitch.tv/dumbdog
This video came from my stream on October 31st, 2022. Catch me live every weekday from 9AM-2PM PT here: http://twitch.tv/Northernlion
I'm excited to check out Fall Guys again because of my preconceived notion that the wins will be flowing ever since the game went free-for-all. Wouldn't you know it, there apparently have been some Fall Guys ringers waiting for this moment just to tear me down. Check it out!
If you enjoyed the video, please consider hitting the Like button. It helps me out a lot! ----------------------------------------------- Subscribe: http://bit.ly/Northernlion Follow me on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Northernlion -----------------------------------------------
